PersonPublicProfilePrefSet.name: PersonPublicProfilePrefSet
PersonPublicProfilePrefSet.description: Represents the userâ€™s preferences for which data is included in their directory entry, as well as if they show up at all.

CanShareEmail.description: Indicates whether the person's email address is shared (true) or not (false).

CanShareLocation.description: Indicates whether the person's location is shared (true) or not (false).

CanSharePersonEducation.description: Indicates that person education should be shared (true) or not (false).

CanSharePersonEmployment.description: Indicates that person employment information should be shared (true) or not (false).

CanSharePhone.description: Indicates whether the person's phone numbers are shared (true) or not (false).

CanSharePronouns.description: Indicates whether the person's preferred pronouns are shared (true) or not (false).

CanShareWebsite.description: Indicates that website should be shared (true) or not (false).

ContactId.description: The Contact associated with the Person Public Profile Preference Set.

IsProfilePublic.description: Indicates whether the profile is public (true) or not (false).

Name.description: An auto-generated string/number assigned to the Person Public Profile Preference Set.

ProfileVisibleDate.description: The date and time when the profile was made public.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage type of the sharing settings, such as Alumni or Student.
